entry.title: Temptation is One Hell of a Thing
entry.summary:
Author: acatcam

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,481Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 60

Summary: Bruce Wayne never expected to walk into a church again—let alone with his four-year-old son in his arms. But when a meeting with Clark Kent, a priest. It turns into more than polite conversation, Bruce finds himself disarmed by a man who shouldn’t have surprised him at all. Clark is broad-shouldered, and impossibly kind; a believer in things Bruce turned his back on the day of his parents’ funeral.Bruce is skeptical, Clark is steadfast. Their ideologies clash from the moment they sit across from one another: billionaire pragmatism versus the faith of a priest. But somewhere between coloring books at Clark’s desk and quiet invitations to community fairs, a dangerous warmth grows. Bruce doesn’t know how to name it, and Clark doesn’t dare.Because whatever is happening between them—it shouldn’t. Bruce pushes, searching for the language he can’t bring himself to say aloud, while Clark whispers what he shouldn’t confess at all: I can’t. A vow binds him to the Church, but his heart betrays him in every secret meeting, every glance held too long.It shouldn’t work. It can’t work. But it does. And as much Clark Kent prays, temptation seeps through.

entry.title: Bring Me To Life Again
entry.summary:
Author: iloveyaoibtw

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,786Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 2

Summary: His heartbeat stayed steady. Good. Because Bruce had never felt a flutter for anything. Clark forced down the seizing pain in his chest, lingering at the doorway for just a few seconds, knowing those deep blue eyes he had drowned in too long were watching him. Watching him carefully. As if, if he lingered even a little longer, he’d break and go back. The distance from him to Bruce was only seven steps.

entry.title: What is a Bat if not for his Two Wings?
entry.summary:
Author: acatcam

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 47,614Chapters: 31/?Kudos: 508

Summary: Bruce Wayne had spent years perfecting the art of being underestimated. The impulsive, table-dancing, ice-sculptor-grinding, billion-dollar himbo persona kept people from looking too closely — especially at Gotham’s other nocturnal resident.But with the Justice League newly formed, curiosity was brewing, and one caped Kryptonian in particular was determined to uncover the man behind the Bat. Clark Kent, investigative journalist and alien protector, was convinced Bruce Wayne’s friendship with Batman meant something more — maybe funding, maybe shared secrets. The problem? Bruce knew Clark’s game, and he was going to play it better. When a gala-turned-villain-attack forced Bruce to act in his Wayne persona and Superman swooped in to save him, the lines between charm and suspicion blurred. Bruce, ever the flirt, ran his hand over Superman’s bicep with a grin and purred, “You saved my life just for a question?”It was going to take more than x-ray vision to win this bet.When a simple bet turns to much more than two players hoped.

entry.title: trampstamp
entry.summary:
Author: rosie_hw

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,502Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 21

Summary: Bruce has always been very reactive to touch, to the point he started to despise it. It was easy to escape it while fighting criminals, every single touch led to pain the Batman learned to ignore and pretend it isn't there. But during the evenings as Bruce Wayne, touch was inevitable. The gruesome handshakes and back pats, the occasional butt slap too. Each time sent electric waves through his body, his eyes widening a little, but he still managed to keep a smile on his face. Thats just how it is, the life of a mentally fucked up billionaire. Getting a puppy like boyfriend with the constant need of physical touch did help though.

entry.title: Lavender Marriage
entry.summary:
Author: TheBobblehat

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 94,986Chapters: 22/22Kudos: 524

Summary: Lex Luthor has sponsored the new wing of the Metropolis Science Museum, and Clark and Bruce both suspect foul play. While in the geology exhibit, they discover an unknown strand of kryptonite, which cripples Clark almost immediately. Bruce drags him away, but just as they're catching their breath, a mysterious gunman fires on Clark from the shadows, piercing his heart with a bullet, specially made from Luthor's new find.Bruce gets Clark to a safe house and manages to extract the bullet, but not before saving Clark from its strange effects. When he wakes up, Clark recognizes Bruce. But not as his caped companion, or a fellow member of the League. They aren't competitors, allies, or even just friends.According to Clark, Bruce Wayne is his husband.

entry.title: Uhm, Clark?!
entry.summary:
Author: Silly_Ody

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,263Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 10

Summary: Bruce Wayne finds himself stuck in a room with nosy --annoyingly cute-- reporter Clark Kent, or as he'd been calling him in his head, 'Farmboy.' And only when the reporter offers him the most stupidly cute dimpled smile does Bruce come to the conclusion "Holy crap?! Clark Kent is Superman??" And from that point on, Bruce makes it his own personal secret mission to prove Clark Kent is Superman, going as far as to buy the very news building Clark worked in, The Daily Planet. Little did he know in his mission for truth, he would accidentally find something much better; love.
